component.name: Urban_Sustainability
component.description: index calculation, included EC,WC, GC value

output.name: outputEnergyConsumption
output.description: result EC from site parameter, reuslt=[min,max], unit=kw

output.name: outputWaterConsumption
output.description: result WC from site parameter, reuslt=[min,max], unit=T

output.name: outputGarbageConsumption
output.description: result GC from site parameter, reuslt=[min,max], unit=kg

component.name: Urban_Sustainability_Custom
component.description: index calculation, included EC,WC, GC value based on input objects

input.name: inputBreps
input.description: input breps to calculate index value

input.name: inputFunctions
input.description: input functions of each brep, R,C,H,O,GIC,M,W,S

output.name: outputEnergyConsumption
output.description: result EC from site parameter, reuslt=[min,max], unit=kw

output.name: outputWaterConsumption
output.description: result WC from site parameter, reuslt=[min,max], unit=T

output.name: outputGarbageConsumption
output.description: result GC from site parameter, reuslt=[min,max], unit=kg

component.name: Urban_Sustainability_ExposureRate
component.description: calculate exposure rate of each side in builidng brep

input.description: input brep list to calculate exposure rate value

component.name: Urban_Sustainability_CalculatePopulation
component.description: calculate population in each residential building

input.description: input brep list to calculate population, unit(m²)
